entry.title: WIND WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon then southwest 60 gusting to 100 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 5.
